name: Francky's Hell
description:
Game

Play against your tray to serve your clients and earn enough money in a limited time

Controls
  • WASD - Move the player
  • Arrows - Rotate the tray
  • Space - Interact with food/customer
  • R - Reset tray state
  • Shift - Run (drop the tray)
Credits

Art: Kenney ( https://kenney.nl/ )

Sources

https://github.com/GameJams-butnamealreadytaken/LD49-Poutinegrade
